schema.name: block_cardgroup
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `block_cardgroup` (`group_type` varchar(255) null default null, `headline` text null default null, `id` char(36) not null default null, `title` varchar(255) null default null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: block_cardgroup_cards
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_cardgroup_cards" (`block_cardgroup_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `href` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `image` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `summary` text NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `block_cardgroup_cards_block_cardgroup_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`block_cardgroup_id`) REFERENCES `block_cardgroup` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `block_cardgroup_cards_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: block_cardgroup_posts
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_cardgroup_posts" (`block_cardgroup_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `posts_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `block_cardgroup_posts_block_cardgroup_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`block_cardgroup_id`) REFERENCES `block_cardgroup` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `block_cardgroup_posts_posts_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`posts_id`) REFERENCES `posts` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: block_columns
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `block_columns` (`headline` text null default null, `id` char(36) not null default null, `title` varchar(255) null default null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: block_columns_rows
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_columns_rows" (`block_columns` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `content` text NULL DEFAULT null, `headline` text NULL DEFAULT null, `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `image` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `image_position` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `block_columns_rows_block_columns_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`block_columns`) REFERENCES `block_columns` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `block_columns_rows_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: block_contact_us
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_contact_us" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `form` char(36) NULL, `title` varchar(255) NULL, `top_title` varchar(255) NULL, `highlight_colour` varchar(255) NULL, `title_colour` varchar(255) NULL, `image` char(36) NULL, `reversed` boolean null, `image_line_colour` varchar(255) null, CONSTRAINT `block_contact_us_form_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`form`) REFERENCES `forms` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `block_contact_us_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: block_cta
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `block_cta` (`buttons` json null default null, `content` text null default null, `headline` text null default null, `id` char(36) not null default null, `title` varchar(255) null default null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: block_faqs
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_faqs" (`faqs` json NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `top_title` varchar(255) null, `title_colour` varchar(255) null, `highlight_colour` varchar(255) null, `background_colour` varchar(255) null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`))

schema.name: block_feature_content
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `block_feature_content` (`id` integer not null primary key autoincrement, `title` varchar(255) null, `top_title` varchar(255) null, `content` text null, `info_block` json null, `button` json null, `highlight_colour` varchar(255) null, `stand_out_block` json null)

schema.name: block_feature_content_files
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_feature_content_files" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `block_feature_content_id` integer NULL, `directus_files_id` char(36) NULL, CONSTRAINT `block_feature_content_files_directus_files_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`directus_files_id`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `block_feature_content_files_block_feature_content_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`block_feature_content_id`) REFERENCES `block_feature_content` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: block_form
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_form" (`form` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `headline` text NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `block_form_form_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`form`) REFERENCES `forms` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)

schema.name: block_gallery
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `block_gallery` (`headline` text null default null, `id` char(36) not null default null, `title` varchar(255) null default null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: block_gallery_files
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_gallery_files" (`block_gallery` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `directus_files_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `block_gallery_files_block_gallery_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`block_gallery`) REFERENCES `block_gallery` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `block_gallery_files_directus_files_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`directus_files_id`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: block_grid_link_block
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_grid_link_block" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NULL, `top_title` varchar(255) NULL, `content` text NULL, `url` varchar(255) NULL, `image` char(36) NULL, `highlight_colour` varchar(255) NULL, `icon` varchar(255) NULL, `button_icon` varchar(255) NULL, `button_text` varchar(255) NULL, `date` date NULL, `tag` json NULL, `type` varchar(255) NULL, `block_grid_links` integer NULL, `sort` integer NULL, `author` varchar(255) NULL, CONSTRAINT `block_grid_link_block_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `block_grid_link_block_block_grid_links_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`block_grid_links`) REFERENCES `block_grid_links` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: block_grid_links
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `block_grid_links` (`id` integer not null primary key autoincrement, `title` varchar(255) null, `top_title` varchar(255) null, `highlight_colour` varchar(255) null, `title_colour` varchar(255) null, `bg_colour` varchar(255) null, `bg_offset` boolean null default '1')

schema.name: block_hero
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_hero" (`content` text NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `image` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `block_hero_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: block_hero_slide
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_hero_slide" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NULL, `content` text NULL, `background_image` char(36) NULL, `image` char(36) NULL, `top_title` varchar(255) NULL, `highlight_colour` varchar(255) NULL, `buttons` json NULL, `home_hero` integer NULL, CONSTRAINT `block_hero_slide_background_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`background_image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `block_hero_slide_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `block_hero_slide_home_hero_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`home_hero`) REFERENCES `block_home_hero` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: block_home_hero
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `block_home_hero` (`id` integer not null primary key autoincrement)

schema.name: block_html
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `block_html` (`id` char(36) not null default null, `raw_html` text null default 'null', primary key (`id`))

schema.name: block_logocloud
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `block_logocloud` (`headline` text null default null, `id` char(36) not null default null, `title` varchar(255) null default null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: block_logocloud_files
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_logocloud_files" (`block_logocloud_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `file` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `block_logocloud_files_block_logocloud_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`block_logocloud_id`) REFERENCES `block_logocloud` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `block_logocloud_files_file_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`file`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: block_quote
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_quote" (`background_color` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `content` text NULL DEFAULT null, `headline` text NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `image` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `subtitle` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `block_quote_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: block_richtext
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `block_richtext` (`content` text null default null, `headline` varchar(255) null default null, `id` char(36) not null default null, `title` varchar(255) null default null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: block_steps
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `block_steps` (`alternate_image_position` boolean not null default '0', `headline` text null default null, `id` char(36) not null default null, `show_step_numbers` boolean null default '1', `title` varchar(255) null default null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: block_steps_items
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_steps_items" (`block_steps` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `content` text NULL DEFAULT null, `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `image` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `block_steps_items_block_steps_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`block_steps`) REFERENCES `block_steps` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `block_steps_items_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: block_team
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `block_team` (`content` text null default null, `headline` text null default null, `id` char(36) not null default null, `title` varchar(255) null default null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: block_testimonials
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `block_testimonials` (`headline` text null default null, `id` char(36) not null default null, `title` varchar(255) null default null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: block_testimonials_items
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_testimonials_items" (`block_testimonials_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `testimonial` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `block_testimonials_items_block_testimonials_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`block_testimonials_id`) REFERENCES `block_testimonials` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `block_testimonials_items_testimonial_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`testimonial`) REFERENCES `testimonials` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: block_video
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "block_video" (`headline` text NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `type` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `video_file` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `video_url` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `block_video_video_file_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`video_file`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: blog_settings
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "blog_settings" (`featured_post` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `headline` text NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `posts_per_page` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `seo` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `blog_settings_featured_post_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`featured_post`) REFERENCES `posts` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `blog_settings_seo_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`seo`) REFERENCES `seo` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: categories
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "categories" (`color` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `content` text NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `seo` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `slug` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `categories_seo_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`seo`) REFERENCES `seo` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: chat_config
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `chat_config` (`enabled` boolean null default '1', `hours` json null default null, `id` char(36) not null default null, `modules` json null default null, `require_email` varchar(255) null default 'never', primary key (`id`))

schema.name: contact_form
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `contact_form` (`id` integer not null primary key autoincrement, `sort` integer null, `date_created` datetime null, `name` varchar(255) null, `email` varchar(255) null, `message` text null, `phone` varchar(255) null, `status` varchar(255) null default 'new', `date_updated` datetime null default null)

schema.name: conversations
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `conversations` (`date_created` datetime null default null, `date_updated` datetime null default null, `id` char(36) not null default null, `status` varchar(255) not null default 'draft', `title` varchar(255) null default null, `visitor_id` varchar(36) null default null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: events
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `events` (`id` char(36) not null default null, `key` varchar(255) null default null, `metadata` json null default null, `service` varchar(255) null default null, `session` varchar(255) null default null, `timestamp` datetime null default null, `user` varchar(36) null default null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: forms
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "forms" (`date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `key` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `on_success` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `redirect_url` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `schema` json NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `submit_label` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `success_message` text NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_created` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `forms_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `forms_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)

schema.name: globals
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "globals" (`address_country` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `address_locality` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `address_region` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `build_hook_url` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `description` text NULL DEFAULT null, `email` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `og_image` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `phone` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `postal_code` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `routes` json NULL DEFAULT null, `social_links` json NULL DEFAULT '[]', `street_address` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `tagline` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `url` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `logo` char(36) NULL, `logo_dark` char(36) NULL, `logo_light` char(36) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `globals_og_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`og_image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `globals_logo_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`logo`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `globals_logo_dark_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`logo_dark`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `globals_logo_light_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`logo_light`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: help_articles
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "help_articles" (`content` text NULL DEFAULT null, `date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `help_collection` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `owner` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `slug` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `summary` text NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_created` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `help_articles_help_collection_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`help_collection`) REFERENCES `help_collections` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `help_articles_owner_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`owner`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `help_articles_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `help_articles_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)

schema.name: help_collections
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `help_collections` (`description` text null default null, `icon` varchar(255) null default null, `id` char(36) not null default null, `slug` varchar(255) null default null, `sort` integer null default null, `title` varchar(255) null default null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: help_feedback
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "help_feedback" (`comments` text NULL DEFAULT null, `date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `rating` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `url` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_created` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `visitor_id` varchar(36) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `help_feedback_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `help_feedback_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)

schema.name: inbox
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "inbox" (`data` json NULL DEFAULT '{}', `date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `form` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `user_created` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `inbox_form_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`form`) REFERENCES `forms` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `inbox_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `inbox_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)

schema.name: messages
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "messages" (`conversation` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `text` text NULL DEFAULT null, `user_created` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `visitor_id` varchar(36) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `messages_conversation_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`conversation`) REFERENCES `conversations` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `messages_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `messages_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)

schema.name: metrics
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `metrics` (`id` char(36) not null default null, `key` varchar(255) null default null, `metadata` json null default null, `service` varchar(255) null default null, `timestamp` datetime null default null, `value` float null default null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: navigation
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "navigation" (`date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `id` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_created` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `navigation_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `navigation_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)

schema.name: navigation_items
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "navigation_items" (`has_children` boolean NULL DEFAULT '0', `icon` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `label` text NULL DEFAULT null, `navigation` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `open_in_new_tab` boolean NULL DEFAULT '0', `page` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `parent` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `type` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `url` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `navigation_items_navigation_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`navigation`) REFERENCES `navigation` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `navigation_items_page_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`page`) REFERENCES `pages` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `navigation_items_parent_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`parent`) REFERENCES `navigation_items` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)

schema.name: pages
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "pages" (`date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `seo` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `slug` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_created` varchar(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` varchar(36) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `pages_seo_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`seo`) REFERENCES `seo` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: pages_blocks
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "pages_blocks" (`collection` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `item` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `pages_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `pages_blocks_pages_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`pages_id`) REFERENCES `pages` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: posts
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "posts" (`author` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `category` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `content` text NULL DEFAULT null, `date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_published` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `image` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `seo` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `slug` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `summary` text NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_created` varchar(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` varchar(36) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `posts_author_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`author`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `posts_category_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`category`) REFERENCES `categories` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `posts_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `posts_seo_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`seo`) REFERENCES `seo` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: projects
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "projects" (`built_with` json NULL DEFAULT null, `client` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `content` text NULL DEFAULT null, `cost` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `image` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `seo` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `slug` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `summary` text NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_created` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `projects_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `projects_seo_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`seo`) REFERENCES `seo` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `projects_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `projects_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)

schema.name: projects_files
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "projects_files" (`directus_files_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `project` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `projects_files_directus_files_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`directus_files_id`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `projects_files_project_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`project`) REFERENCES `projects` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: projects_settings
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "projects_settings" (`headline` text NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `seo` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `hero` char(36) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `projects_settings_seo_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`seo`) REFERENCES `seo` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `projects_settings_hero_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`hero`) REFERENCES `block_hero` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: projects_settings_hero
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "projects_settings_hero" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `projects_settings_id` char(36) NULL, `item` varchar(255) NULL, `collection` varchar(255) NULL, CONSTRAINT `projects_settings_hero_projects_settings_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`projects_settings_id`) REFERENCES `projects_settings` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: redirects
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "redirects" (`date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `response_code` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `url_new` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `url_old` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_created` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `redirects_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `redirects_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)

schema.name: seo
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "seo" (`canonical_url` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `meta_description` text NULL DEFAULT null, `no_follow` boolean NULL DEFAULT '0', `no_index` boolean NULL DEFAULT '0', `og_image` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `sitemap_change_frequency` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'hourly', `sitemap_priority` float NULL DEFAULT '0.5', `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `seo_og_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`og_image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: team
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "team" (`bio` text NULL DEFAULT null, `date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `image` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `job_title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `name` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `social_media` json NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `user_created` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `team_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `team_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `team_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)

schema.name: testimonials
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "testimonials" (`company` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `company_logo` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `content` text NULL DEFAULT null, `date_created` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_updated` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `image` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `link` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `sort` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `subtitle` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_created` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `user_updated` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `testimonials_company_logo_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`company_logo`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `testimonials_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `testimonials_user_created_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `testimonials_user_updated_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION)
